articles.author: Mitchell Clark
articles.content:
Samsungs future may be foldable
Illustration by Alex Castro / The Verge
Samsung is reportedly working on a double-folding phone to add to its lineup, according to Nikkei Asia (via 9to5Google). Acco… [+1959 chars]
articles.description: According to Nikkei Asia, Samsung is working on a folding phone that will fold in two places, as opposed to the single-fold designs the company currently offers. The news comes as Samsung is talking about skipping a Note offering this year.
articles.title: Samsung is reportedly working on a double-folding phone - The Verge

articles.author: Tim Fitzsimons
articles.content:
A woman of Asian descent was violently assaulted in New York City on Sunday while she was traveling to a protest against anti-Asian violence in what police are calling a hate crime.
The 37-year-old … [+1911 chars]
articles.description: A woman traveling to a protest against anti-Asian hate crimes was assaulted, her sign destroyed, and punched twice in the face, police in New York said.
articles.title: Woman of Asian descent assaulted in NYC on her way to protest anti-Asian violence - NBC News

articles.content:
SINGAPORE - A jobless man, who was the godfather of two young brothers, offered to house the boys and their mother in his one-room flat after learning that they were staying at a crisis shelter.
But… [+3760 chars]
articles.description: SINGAPORE - A jobless man, who was the godfather of two young brothers, offered to house the boys and their mother in his one-room flat after learning that they were staying at a crisis shelter. But during the two-month stay in his flat, the 32-year-old man s…
articles.title: Man, 32, admits to sexually abusing young godsons whom he sheltered at his flat - AsiaOne

articles.content: TOKYO -- Japanese startup Astroscale launched a satellite on Monday designed to usher in an era of sustainable space flight by locating and retrieving used satellites and other space junk. The six-mo… [+4421 chars]
articles.description: Startup's demonstration is first-ever commercial orbital cleanup mission
articles.title: Japan's Astroscale launches space debris-removal satellite - Nikkei Asia

articles.content:
Members of Parliament are speaking out against anti-Asian racism days after a white gunman killed eight people, including six Asian women, in Atlanta.
"It just strikes fear through your heart," said… [+3205 chars]
articles.description: Three Asian Canadian MPs joined CBC's Rosemary Barton Live on Sunday to talk about anti-Asian racism after white gunman killed eight people, including six Asian women, in Atlanta.
articles.title: 'It just strikes fear through your heart': Asian Canadian MPs speak out against racism after Atlanta shootings - CBC.ca
